page.title: 03A typical day for Nicholas.
page.content: My family Mum, Dad, Richard 15yrs and me, Nicholas 10yrs.We get up at 7.15, we have breakfast of fruit juice, cereal toast and honey.Dad feeds the cat and dog,Mum feeds the pony.Richard and I take the dog for a walk.8.00am Dad and Richard leave for work and school.8.25am Mum takes me and another boy to school then she goes to her school,she is a teacher.An interesting day at school would be trombone lesson computer work, maths, English, painting, games.3.45pm Mum takes me and 3 more children home in her car. 5.30pm we have tea.I may watch T.V.or play with friends, if it is Tuesday I go to Cubs in Barnby Dun with my friends John, Richard and my cousin Malcolm.I usually go to bed at 9.00pm.
